version_description:
Have you heard!?

The Paltalk Mobile audio team just released some sweet new features including a brand new audio platform (that you gotta listen to), major performance updates so conversations and room joins are stable streams of uninterrupted chatting and a new lighter ad experience. As always, we love your voice, so please provide feedback to ptmobile@paltalk.com. Thanks!

Have you heard!?

The Paltalk Mobile audio team just released some sweet new features including a brand new audio platform (that you gotta listen to), major performance updates so conversations and room joins are stable streams of uninterrupted chatting and a new lighter ad experience. As always, we love your voice, so please provide feedback to ptmobile@paltalk.com. Thanks!

Have you heard!?

The Paltalk Mobile audio team just released some sweet new features including a brand new audio platform (that you gotta listen to), major performance updates so conversations and room joins are stable streams of uninterrupted chatting and a new lighter ad experience. As always, we love your voice, so please provide feedback to ptmobile@paltalk.com. Thanks!

No way?! YES way!

The Paltalk Mobile team just made some amazing improvements to sticker packs. Now all stickers download superfast and always appear on the screen when used. Hold on, there’s more! While we were knocking this out, we also took care of a few little bugs we found. So stick with us and as always, we love your voice, so please provide feedback to ptmobile@paltalk.com. Thanks!

- Flair
- Supports color nicknames
- Various bug fixes and improvements

- Flair
- Supports color nicknames
- Various bug fixes and improvements

Live room activity feed displaying room events, recent gifters, and notifications to show you what's happening
Easier and friendlier way to invite friends to Paltalk
Persistent tab bar will display on all screens to help you join rooms, access messages, and manage profile
Superior and enhanced audio
Various bug fixes and app improvements

Live room activity feed displaying room events, recent gifters, and notifications to show you what's happening
Easier and friendlier way to invite friends to Paltalk
Persistent tab bar will display on all screens to help you join rooms, access messages, and manage profile
Superior and enhanced audio
Various bug fixes and app improvements

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features, improvements, and fixes. Thanks for using Paltalk!

If you like our apps, please take a moment to rate us in the App Store. For bug reports or complaints, email ptmobile@paltalk.com. We read and reply to every message.

- Use the Paltalk All Star Sticker Pack with your friends on iMessage for FREE!
- Improved video and audio quality
- Improved video and audio stability
- Mute a room
- Global notifications - immediate notification when Pals message you, whether you are in the app or away
- Simplified picture upload for profile/gallery
- Various bug fixes, including Bluetooth connectivity issues

- Use the Paltalk All Star Sticker Pack with your friends on iMessage for FREE!

- Improved video and audio stability
- Mute a room

- Simplified picture upload for profile/gallery
- Various bug fixes, including Bluetooth connectivity issues

- Enhanced audio and video experience
- Improved app stability, whether you're starting or stopping the app, or switching networks
- Lots of various bug fixes

- Enhanced audio and video experience
- Improved app stability, whether you're starting or stopping the app, or switching networks
- Lots of various bug fixes

- Premium members stand out in room chat streams with messages in their subscription color
- A new Paltalk dating tab linking you to our friends at FirstMet
- Various bug fixes

- Experience a brand new home page design and enjoy new features that help you meet someone, connect with friends, and join rooms quickly and easily
- Various bug fixes

- NEW design and user experience offering enjoyable one to one chat/video interactions
- Enhanced privacy features to protect member privacy
- Various bug fixes

We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve Paltalk. In this update, we have focused on audio issues; we've fixed multiple issues with audio routing to the correct speakers and some other smaller bugs.

Pals! there are some cool NEW features in this version:
-- You can now create, manage and admin your own chat room - from your iPhone!
-- We have added some super-fun video effects -- with many more to coming soon!

Enjoy!
